name.title: AE Title
name.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

description.title: AE Description
description.description: Unconstrained text description of the application entity

dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.title: Hide Not Rejected Instances
dcmHideNotRejectedInstances.description: Indicates that the Q/R Services of the AE hides instances not rejected by any reason; false if absent

dcmAcceptedUserRole.title: Accepted User Roles
dcmAcceptedUserRole.description: Roles of users from which web requests are accepted; any if absent
